body: Judiciary workers have concluded a week-long strike requesting higher salaries. Voices from El Salvador's Weblog summarizes how the strike ended and its impact.
original_body: Judiciary workers have concluded a week-long strike requesting higher salaries. Voices from El Salvador's Weblog summarizes how the strike ended and its impact.
title: El Salvador: Court System Employees End Strike

sentence: Judiciary workers have concluded a week-long strike requesting higher salaries.
Voices from El Salvador's Weblog summarizes how the strike ended and its impact.
